title: Thursday's Child
description: When Paulette marries Garret Holden, she's certain their love will last. Their first year is exciting and romantic until tragedy strikes. They suffer a bitter separation, and Paulette blames Garret. Then her uncle sends word from Greece that Garret has been shot and is hunted by German agents. When Paulette sets out on a perilous journey to find him, Hitler's army is ready to storm Athens. "Thursday's child has far to go" in her search for her husband-and her own journey. Leaving a place of safety, Paulette puts herself into God's hands to reconcile with the man she's promised to love foreve
author: Linda Lee Chaikin
